recommendation: On 21 May 2020 the Commission recommended that Shih Wei Navigation Company Limited (Taiwan) carry out a comprehensive safety assessment of vessels engaged in carrying and securing deck log cargo. The assessment is to result in appropriate procedures and guidance being contained in the safety management system and ensure that a safe system of work is established.
safety_issue: The operator's safety management system was not supported by an effective safety assessment of log-cargo-securing operations, which should have identified the hazards present. This resulted in ineffective controls to mitigate the risks to crew when completing these tasks.
